SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Will return basic contact information in a flat object. If you want to return the full contact object, run a read request on the returned contactID

PARAMETERS.NAME: givenName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Given (first) name. Maximum 40 characters.

PARAMETERS.NAME: surname
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Surname (last name). Maximum 40 characters.

PARAMETERS.NAME: title
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Tile/salutation

PARAMETERS.NAME: emailAddress
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Email address. Must be a valid email address

PARAMETERS.NAME: ContactActive
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Retrieve Active Contact Records. Passing false will return inactive records.

PARAMETERS.NAME: dob
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Date of Birth in the format YYYY-MM-DD. This cannot be dated in the future.

PARAMETERS.NAME: sex
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Must be only a single letter. Valid values are M, F or X (for Other)

PARAMETERS.NAME: middleName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Middle name(s). Maximum 40 characters.

PARAMETERS.NAME: phone
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Home phone number

PARAMETERS.NAME: mobilephone
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Mobile phone number

PARAMETERS.NAME: workphone
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Work phone number

PARAMETERS.NAME: fax
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Fax number

PARAMETERS.NAME: organisation
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Organisation name

PARAMETERS.NAME: orgId
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: ID of the organisation to assign the contact. Will be their primary organisation if the contact has multiple.

PARAMETERS.NAME: orgIds
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A list of organisation IDs to set against the contact. This will overwrite any existing non-primary organisations against the contact. This will allow upto five organisation IDs.

PARAMETERS.NAME: position
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Position within the organisation

PARAMETERS.NAME: section
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Section within the organisation

PARAMETERS.NAME: division
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Division within the organisation

PARAMETERS.NAME: SourceCodeID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The client-specific sourceID from the list set up in aXcelerate and returned from the contact/sources resource.

PARAMETERS.NAME: HistoricClientID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Historical ID used with the student record. IMPORTANT IF: you have reported a person previously with a different SMS.

PARAMETERS.NAME: USI
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Unique Student Identifier (USI). A 10-digit code. If passed, this code must conform to the minimum validation: It must be 10 digits in length and consist of only capital letters and numbers, excluding I, 1, 0 and O.

PARAMETERS.NAME: LUI
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Queensland Studies Authority Learner Unique Identifier (LUI). A 10-digit, numeric code.

PARAMETERS.NAME: TFN
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The student's Tax File Number, used for VET Student Loans reporting. The number must pass the ATO's check alorithm.

PARAMETERS.NAME: VSN
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Victorian Student Number The VSN is a student identification number that is assigned by the Department of Education and Early Childhood Development to all students in government and nonâ€‘government schools, and students in Vocational Education and Training institutions.

PARAMETERS.NAME: WorkReadyParticipantNumber
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: This field was formerly knows as 'Skills for All Number'. A South Australian student identifier.

PARAMETERS.NAME: SACEStudentID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: South Australian Certificate of Education student identifier. It should consist of six numbers and one alpha letter, for e.g., 123456A.

PARAMETERS.NAME: EmergencyContact
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Name of an emergency contact

PARAMETERS.NAME: EmergencyContactRelation
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The relationship of the emergency contact (eg sister)

PARAMETERS.NAME: EmergencyContactPhone
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The phone number of the emergency contact

PARAMETERS.NAME: ParentContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The contactID of the parent or guardian

PARAMETERS.NAME: buildingName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields - will take these fields over address1 and address2 if passed. Note, you cannot search contacts by these discrete fields.

PARAMETERS.NAME: unitNo
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: streetNo
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: streetName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: POBox
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: address1
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: First line of POSTAL address - address fields will be used only if AVETMISS 7.0 fields not passed. The return structure will also include these fields.

PARAMETERS.NAME: address2
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Second line of postal address

PARAMETERS.NAME: city
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Postal suburb, locality or town

PARAMETERS.NAME: state
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Postal state / Territory. NOTE: This field is tailored for Australia and accepts only the following values: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, WA, TAS, NT, ACT or OTH (which means 'Other Australian Territory') or OVS (which means 'Overseas')

PARAMETERS.NAME: postcode
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Postal postcode

PARAMETERS.NAME: countryID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Postal Country - a 4-digit SACC code. This is only used if the full AVETMISS 7.0 address details are passed. Otherwise this field is ignored. Use Country instead.

PARAMETERS.NAME: country
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Postal Country

PARAMETERS.NAME: sbuildingName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields - will take these fields over address1 and address2 if passed. Note, you cannot search contacts by these discrete fields.

PARAMETERS.NAME: sunitNo
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: sstreetNo
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: sstreetName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: sPOBox
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 7.0 fields

PARAMETERS.NAME: saddress1
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: First line of STREET / residential address - address fields will be deprecated with the coming of AVETMISS 7.0 which will break the address into further fields (eg Flat/unit number, Street Name)

PARAMETERS.NAME: saddress2
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Second line of street / residential address - to be deprecated in the future

PARAMETERS.NAME: scity
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Residential suburb, locality or town

PARAMETERS.NAME: sstate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Residential state / Territory. NOTE: This field is tailored for Australia and accepts only the following values: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, WA, TAS, NT, ACT or OTH (which means 'Other Australian Territory') or OVS (which means 'Overseas')

PARAMETERS.NAME: spostcode
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Residential postcode

PARAMETERS.NAME: scountryID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Residential Country - a 4-digit SACC code. This is only used if the full AVETMISS 7.0 address details are passed. Otherwise this field is ignored. Use SCountry instead.

PARAMETERS.NAME: scountry
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Residential Country

PARAMETERS.NAME: termAddress1
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: First line of TERM address. Term address is only available for clients who have enabled the VET Student Loan feature.

PARAMETERS.NAME: termAddress2
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Second line of term address

PARAMETERS.NAME: termCity
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Term Address suburb, locality or town

PARAMETERS.NAME: termState
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Term Address state / Territory. NOTE: This field is tailored for Australia and accepts only the following values: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, WA, TAS, NT, ACT or OTH (which means 'Other Australian Territory') or OVS (which means 'Overseas')

PARAMETERS.NAME: termPostcode
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Term Address postcode

PARAMETERS.NAME: termCountryID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Term Address Country - a 4-digit SACC code. You can use this or termCountry

PARAMETERS.NAME: termCountry
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Term Address Country

PARAMETERS.NAME: CountryofBirthID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Country of Birth as a valid 4-digit SACC code. For a list of codes, please refer to NCVER website www.ncver.edu.au

PARAMETERS.NAME: CityofBirth
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: City of Birth. This data is used if later creating a USI for this contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: CountryofCitizenID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Country of citizenship as a valid 4-digit SACC code. For a list of codes, please refer to NCVER website www.ncver.edu.au

PARAMETERS.NAME: CitizenStatusID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Citizenship status. The valid values are numbers 1-11. For a list of the meanings of these numbers, please contact aXcelerate

PARAMETERS.NAME: ResidencyStatusID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Residency status. For a list of valid numbers/codes, please refer to the TAMS 1.2 specifications.

PARAMETERS.NAME: LabourForceID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS Labour force status identifier. For valid values see the AVETMISS documentation

PARAMETERS.NAME: MainLanguageID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS Main language other than English spoken at home identifier as a valid 4-digit SACC code. For a list of codes, please refer to NCVER website www.ncver.edu.au

PARAMETERS.NAME: EnglishProficiencyID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS Proficiency in spoken English. For valid values see the AVETMISS documentation

PARAMETERS.NAME: EnglishAssistanceFlag
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A true/false flag to indicate whether English assistance is required

PARAMETERS.NAME: HighestSchoolLevelID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS highest school level completed identifier. For valid values see the AVETMISS documentation

PARAMETERS.NAME: HighestSchoolLevelYear
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The year the highest school level was completed. Must be a valid year no later than the current year

PARAMETERS.NAME: AtSchoolFlag
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A true/false AVETMISS flag to indicate whether the contact is currently at secondary school

PARAMETERS.NAME: AtSchoolName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The name of the contact's current secondary school

PARAMETERS.NAME: PriorEducationStatus
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A true/false AVETMISS flag to indicate whether a contact has successfully completed some post-secondary education. A true value here will be ignored without also passing PriorEducationIDs.

PARAMETERS.NAME: PriorEducationIDs
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A comma delimited list of AVETMISS prior educational achievement identifiers to indicate prior higher education. For valid values see the AVETMISS documentation. The Victorian AVETMISS field Prior Educational Achievement Recognition Identifier may be appended (e.g. 420A). Also accepts @ if not specified.

PARAMETERS.NAME: DisabilityFlag
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A true/false AVETMISS flag to indicate whether the contact considers themselves to have a disability, impairment or long-term condition

PARAMETERS.NAME: DisabilityTypeIDs
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A comma delimited list of AVETMISS disability type identifiers. For valid values see the AVETMISS documentation

PARAMETERS.NAME: IndigenousStatusID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS indigenous status identifier to indicates a contact who self-identifies as being of Australian Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander descent. For valid values see the AVETMISS documentation

PARAMETERS.NAME: ANZSCOCode
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Australian and New Zealand Standard Classification of Occupations (ANZSCO), ABS catalogue no.1220.0, 2009. The major group of this code is used for the Victorian AVETMISS field Client Occupation Identifier (left most digit)

PARAMETERS.NAME: ANZSICCode
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Australian and New Zealand Standard Industrial Classification (ANZSIC), ABS catalogue no.1292.0, 2006. The division of this code is used for the Victorian AVETMISS field Client Industry of Employment (see ABS catalogue)

PARAMETERS.NAME: SurveyContactStatusCode
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 8.0 Survey contact status - Survey contact status identifies reasons to exclude clients from the Student Outcomes Survey and other communications. For a list of possible codes, please refer to the data definitions on the NCVER website AVETMISS Data element definitions

PARAMETERS.NAME: EmailAddressAlternative
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: AVETMISS 8.0 Alternate email address

PARAMETERS.NAME: employerContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID of the Contact Record who is the Employer of this Contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: payerContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID of the Contact Record who is the Payer of this Contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: supervisorContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID of the Contact Record who is the Supervisor of this Contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: agentContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID of the Contact Record who is the Agent for this Contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: coachContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID of the Contact Record who is the Coach for this Contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: internationalContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID of the Contact Record who is the International Contact for this Contact (CRICOS).

PARAMETERS.NAME: optionalID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: An optional identifier to use for this Contact record.

PARAMETERS.NAME: categoryIDs
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A list of valid category IDs. (adds to Contact ONLY)

PARAMETERS.NAME: customField_[variableName]
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Replace [variableName] with the actual customField variable name to set a customField value against the contact. If updating a custom field that supports multiple values, you can use comma-delimited values or a JSON array. If using comma-delimited, it is expected the data is URL encoded first. For example, to get 2 values: 'A,B' and 'C' you would either pass: "['A,B','C']" or "A%2CB,C"

PARAMETERS.NAME: domainIDs
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A list of domainIDs to set against the contact. This will overwrite any existing domains against the contact. Requires the Contact Domains feature to be enabled in the account.

PARAMETERS.NAME: checkEmailAddressUnique
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: If set to true, the system will check that the email address is unique before creating the contact. If it is not unique, an error will be thrown.

DESCRIPTION: Creates a new contact. This API will not try and search for any existing contact, but simply creates a new one. If you ended up creating duplicate contacts, they can be later merged by logging into aXcelerate.
